channel.title: Music – 정키
channel.description: Recent content in 정키 on Music

item.title: 정키,Musiq Soulchild - My Girl
item.description:
The very first time
I saw you
Still runs
through my mind
And all
I can see is you
Because of you
I find myself restless
Feel like it’s not me
anymore
I never knew
that I could love
Someone so much
my girl
Sometimes I swear
that you’ll leave me
Maybe
it’s just a dream
And I even doubt
that you are real
I doubt if you have
someone like me
I doubt if you have
them around you
I hate to be
one of those
I hope to be
the one for you
Babe I love you
why it’s so hard
To come
and just say this
What would you say
it makes me wonder
Cuz all that time
I spent with you
My feelings have
grown
But
you will never know
You don’t have
any clue clue
It’s not
just some game
You’ve heard
before
It’s nothing
like an old cliche
Can someone please
tell me what to say
I never want you
to get me wrong
Don’t wanna hurt you
my baby no
I hope
that you feel like me
What if you feel
just like me
(Babe I love you
why it’s so hard
To come
and just say this)
I don’t think
I can take
What you might say
I wonder
All all this time
I spent with you
My my feelings
have grown
But you will
never know never know
I get so weak
with butterflies
When I’m comin’ up
to you
But I can’t stop now
can someone tell me
What should I do
if she hesitates
One more step close
I’ll get to you
Stay
where you are my baby
(I want you to
be my girl stay baby)
That’s all
I ask of you
(You’re the only one
I care for
The one that I adore
I feel like it’s time
I should
let you know that
Babe
I love you)
I’m not perfect
but I’m so true
My heart
you’ll listen
My girl my girl
my girl
You are the only one
true love
My dear
my girl
